greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of new minima of phi(p-1)/(p-1), where phi is Euler's totient function and p = prime(n).
comment: The values of p are in A241196. The denominator is in A241198.
mathematica: tMin = {{2, 1}}; Do[p = Prime[n]; tn = EulerPhi[p - 1]/(p - 1); If[tn < tMin[[-1, -1]], AppendTo[tMin, {p, tn}]], {n, 10^7}]; Numerator[Transpose[tMin][[2]]]
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Apr 17 2014
